description: ***FREE STRATA FEES FOR ONE YEAR***Tucked away in a quiet, well-maintained complex, this ULTRA CLEAN 3 BED - 2.5 BATH townhome offers comfortable and functional living in the heart of Walnut Grove. The bright, open-concept layout features stainless steel appliances in the kitchen and a spacious dining and living area that flows out to a private patio, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. With tasteful finishes and plenty of natural light throughout, this home is move-in ready and ideal for those seeking low-maintenance living without compromising on style or location. Close to parks, schools, shopping, and transit. ***FREE STRATA FEES FOR ONE YEAR***
